verses.plain: This is the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created man, in the likeness of God made he him;

tokens.t: This
the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created man, in the likeness of God made he him;

verses.plain: Male and female created he them; and blessed them, and called their name Adam, in the day when they were created.

tokens.t: Male and female created he them; and blessed them, and called their name Adam, in the day when they were created.

verses.plain: ¶ And Adam lived an hundred and thirty years, and begat a son in his own likeness, after his image; and called his name Seth:

tokens.t: ¶ And Adam lived an hundred and thirty years, and begat
in his own likeness, after his image; and called his name Seth:

verses.plain: And the days of Adam after he had begotten Seth were eight hundred years: and he begat sons and daughters:

tokens.t: And the days of Adam after he had begotten Seth were eight hundred years: and he begat sons and daughters:

verses.plain: And all the days that Adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years: and he died.

tokens.t: And all the days that Adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years: and he died.

verses.plain: And Seth lived an hundred and five years, and begat Enos:

tokens.t: And Seth lived an hundred and five years, and begat Enos:

verses.plain: And Seth lived after he begat Enos eight hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters:

tokens.t: And Seth lived after he begat Enos eight hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters:

verses.plain: And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years: and he died.

tokens.t: And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years: and he died.

verses.plain: ¶ And Enos lived ninety years, and begat Cainan:

tokens.t: ¶ And Enos lived ninety years, and begat Cainan:

verses.plain: And Enos lived after he begat Cainan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begat sons and daughters:

tokens.t: And Enos lived after he begat Cainan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begat sons and daughters:

verses.plain: And all the days of Enos were nine hundred and five years: and he died.

tokens.t: And all the days of Enos were nine hundred and five years: and he died.

verses.plain: ¶ And Cainan lived seventy years, and begat Mahalaleel:

tokens.t: ¶ And Cainan lived seventy years, and begat Mahalaleel:

verses.plain: And Cainan lived after he begat Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begat sons and daughters:

tokens.t: And Cainan lived after he begat Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begat sons and daughters:

verses.plain: And all the days of Cainan were nine hundred and ten years: and he died.

tokens.t: And all the days of Cainan were nine hundred and ten years: and he died.

verses.plain: ¶ And Mahalaleel lived sixty and five years, and begat Jared:

tokens.t: ¶ And Mahalaleel lived sixty and five years, and begat Jared:

verses.plain: And Mahalaleel lived after he begat Jared eight hundred and thirty years, and begat sons and daughters:

tokens.t: And Mahalaleel lived after he begat Jared eight hundred and thirty years, and begat sons and daughters:

verses.plain: And all the days of Mahalaleel were eight hundred ninety and five years: and he died.

tokens.t: And all the days of Mahalaleel were eight hundred ninety and five years: and he died.

verses.plain: ¶ And Jared lived an hundred sixty and two years, and he begat Enoch:

tokens.t: ¶ And Jared lived an hundred sixty and two years, and he begat Enoch:

verses.plain: And Jared lived after he begat Enoch eight hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:

tokens.t: And Jared lived after he begat Enoch eight hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:

verses.plain: And all the days of Jared were nine hundred sixty and two years: and he died.

tokens.t: And all the days of Jared were nine hundred sixty and two years: and he died.

verses.plain: ¶ And Enoch lived sixty and five years, and begat Methuselah:

tokens.t: ¶ And Enoch lived sixty and five years, and begat Methuselah:

verses.plain: And Enoch walked with God after he begat Methuselah three hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:

tokens.t: And Enoch walked with God after he begat Methuselah three hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:

verses.plain: And all the days of Enoch were three hundred sixty and five years:

tokens.t: And all the days of Enoch were three hundred sixty and five years:

verses.plain: And Enoch walked with God: and he was not; for God took him.

tokens.t: And Enoch walked with God: and he
not; for God took him.

verses.plain: And Methuselah lived an hundred eighty and seven years, and begat Lamech:

tokens.t: And Methuselah lived an hundred eighty and seven years, and begat Lamech:

verses.plain: And Methuselah lived after he begat Lamech seven hundred eighty and two years, and begat sons and daughters:

tokens.t: And Methuselah lived after he begat Lamech seven hundred eighty and two years, and begat sons and daughters:

verses.plain: And all the days of Methuselah were nine hundred sixty and nine years: and he died.

tokens.t: And all the days of Methuselah were nine hundred sixty and nine years: and he died.

verses.plain: ¶ And Lamech lived an hundred eighty and two years, and begat a son:

tokens.t: ¶ And Lamech lived an hundred eighty and two years, and begat a son:

verses.plain: And he called his name Noah, saying, This same shall comfort us concerning our work and toil of our hands, because of the ground which the LORD hath cursed.

tokens.t: And he called his name Noah, saying, This
shall comfort us concerning our work and toil of our hands, because of the ground which the
hath cursed.

verses.plain: And Lamech lived after he begat Noah five hundred ninety and five years, and begat sons and daughters:

tokens.t: And Lamech lived after he begat Noah five hundred ninety and five years, and begat sons and daughters:

verses.plain: And all the days of Lamech were seven hundred seventy and seven years: and he died.

tokens.t: And all the days of Lamech were seven hundred seventy and seven years: and he died.

verses.plain: And Noah was five hundred years old: and Noah begat Shem, Ham, and Japheth.

tokens.t: And Noah was five hundred years old: and Noah begat Shem, Ham, and Japheth.

footnotes.text: Noah: Gr. Noe: that is Rest, or, Comfort
